text: Yesli by My zakhoteli, to vozvysili by yego imi; no on privyazalsya k zemnomu i posledoval svoyey strasti. On upodobilsya psu, kotoryy, kogda gonish' yego, vysovyvayet yazyk; kogda ostavlyayesh' yego, vysovyvayet yazyk. Vot chemu podobny lyudi, kotoryye schitayut lozhnymi nashi znameniya. Rasskazyvay im etot rasskaz: mozhet byt', oni odumayutsya
